title: Incorrect calculation of convective massflux variables mc, mcu, mcd, smc, dmc
description: For all referenced simulations, the variables mc_CFday, mc_Amon, mcu_CFmon, mcd_CFmon, smc_CFmon and dmc_CFmon have been calculated incorrectly within the atmospheric submodel echam6. All affected datasets will be retracted. A correction is not possible without a rerun of the simulations.
